name: logseq-metrics
description: Track and visaulize your personal habits, goals and business results in Logseq.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:lin && npm run clean:win
scripts.clean:win: node -e "if (process.platform === 'win32') process.exit(1)" || , if exist dist rmdir /Q /S dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-css && parcel build --public-url . --no-optimize index.html

title: Metrics
